Module org.example.eiscuno
Package org.example.eiscuno.view.drawers

Class ShapeDrawer

java.lang.Object
org.example.eiscuno.view.drawers.ShapeDrawer
public class ShapeDrawer extends Object
Utility class responsible for drawing composite shapes used in the UNO game interface.

This class programmatically builds complex shapes using Shape elements grouped in a Group, which can then be added to a Scene.

See Also:

  • Shape
  • Scene

  • Method Details

    • drawPerson

      public Group drawPerson()
      Draws a person icon as a Group composed of Ellipse, Circle, and QuadCurve shapes.

      This method creates a stylized person figure that is used in the game UI to represent the human player.

      Returns:
      a Group containing the person icon shapes.

    • drawRobot

      public Group drawRobot()
      Draws a robot icon as a Group composed of Rectangle, Circle, and Line shapes.

      This method creates a stylized robot figure that is used in the game UI to represent the machine player

      Returns:
      a Group containing the robot icon shapes.
